column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The General Department of Immigration have cooperated with local forces to crack down and arrest  54 Chinese nationals in Khan Toul Kork in connection with an illegal gambling syndicate.------The raid was conducted at about 2.30 on the afternoon of January 17
column5: Street 564 Sangkat Boeung Kok 1 after receiving information of an illegal online gambling operation.------ 54 people Chinese “spinach dogs*”
column8: phones and other devices involved with criminal conduct.------The Chinese suspects  were sent to the General Department of Immigration to take legal action. ------*Spinach dog: Chinese slang for low level illicit gambling workers------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/48520
